trans-unit.source: After making changes to this plugin, you should update its version number in
trans-unit.target: 在对这个插件进行更改后,你应该更新它的版本号在

trans-unit.source: For more information on the plugin development process, see the original proposal at:
trans-unit.target: 关于插件开发过程的更多信息,请参见原提案,网址:。

trans-unit.source: If you want to run this plugin’s tests use:
trans-unit.target: 如果要运行此插件的测试，请使用：

trans-unit.source: If you want to work on its code, you can use:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想研究它的代码,你可以用。

trans-unit.source: Note that when installed as an egg file, changes made to the source code will not affect Chandler execution, until you run
trans-unit.target: 请注意,当以蛋文件的形式安装时,对源代码所做的修改不会影响Chandler的执行,直到你运行了

trans-unit.source: The Report Plug-in is an experimental plug-in. As we’ve made changes and improvements to the app, plug-ins such as this one have not been updated or tested. As a result, to safeguard against data corruption, we recommend that you run a separate, clean version of Chandler when installing plug-ins.
trans-unit.target: 报告插件是一个实验性插件。当我们对应用程序进行了更改和改进时，尚未对此类插件进行更新或测试。因此，为了防止数据损坏，我们建议您在安装插件时运行单独的干净版本的Chandler。

trans-unit.source: The Report Plug-in provides support for progress reporting in Chandler.
trans-unit.target: 报告插件为Chandler中的进度报告提供支持。

trans-unit.source: and in the chandler/Makefile, so that people using “quick builds” of Chandler will use your new version.
trans-unit.target: 并在chandler / Makefile中，以便使用Chandler的“快速构建”的人将使用您的新版本。

trans-unit.source: to install it in development mode (where you can make changes and have them take effect whenever Chandler is restarted), or you can use:
trans-unit.target: 在开发模式下安装它(你可以在开发模式下进行修改,并在Chandler重新启动时让它们生效),或者你可以使用。
